page.title: 15TYPICAL FAMILY LIFE
page.content: SOMETIMES DAD AND MY FAMILY GO TO THE CROFT TOGETHER AND WE HELP DAD WITH THE FLOCK.SOMETIMES WE BRING THEM TO THE HILL SO THEY GET THE RICH GREEN GRASS. WE ALL HELP OUT, MY SISTER' AND MY MUM AND DAD. WE MAKE SURE THE ANIMALS ARE HEALTHY AND WELL. WHEN THE ANIMALS TAKE ILL WE HAVE TO CALL THE VET OVER FROM PORTREE ON SKYE BECAUSE THERE IS NO VET ON THE ISLAND. WE ALL HELP OUT AND DO OUR PARTS TO KEEP THE ANIMALS IN GOOD HEALTH. SOMETIMES WE CUT WOOD SO WE GET OUR FIREWOOD, OTHERS CUT PEATS.THE TREES GIVE A LOT OF HEAT SO DOES THE PEAT. AS A FAMILY WE GO TO CHURCH TO LISTEN TO THE REV.DR.TALLACH.CHURCH HAS TWO SERVICES WE GO TO THE ONE THAT STARTS AT 6.00PM AND FINISHES AT 7.30PM.WE SING PSALMS AND REV.DR.TALLACH READS A CHAPTER OF THE BIBLE.
